title: Mobile SEO - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Pete Watson-Wailes September 15, 2016 Introducing Progressive Web Apps: What They Might Mean for Your Website and SEO Technical SEO | Advanced SEO | Mobile SEO Progressive Web Apps are the next big thing when it comes to delivering a dynamite mobile experience. But what actually makes a PWA? Should you have one? And if you create one, how will you make sure it ranks? Read this post By: Colleen Harris August 26, 2016 Case Study: Why it Makes Sense to Optimize Your Site for ‘Near Me’ Searches Advanced SEO | Search Engines | Mobile SEO Have you updated your website's content to take advantage of ‘near me’ searches? Case Study: Why it Makes Sense to Optimize Your Site for Searches Read this post By: Talia Wolf August 18, 2016 Responsive Design is Killing Two-Thirds of Your Conversions. Here's How to Fix It. User Experience (UX) | Mobile SEO There's a 270% gap in conversions between desktop and mobile. Talia Wolf identifies the main contributing factors and explains what you can do to begin closing that gap. Read this post By: Jennifer Slegg August 3, 2016 Google's Rolling Out AMP to the Main SERPs – Are You Prepared? Technical SEO | Advanced SEO | Mobile SEO Are you ready for AMP? Google announced that AMP is going beyond the news carousel to join the "10 blue links." Jen Slegg takes you through the changes, what to expect, and how to prepare. Read this post By: Brad Smith July 21, 2016 Why Mobile-First Is the Only Design Worth Your Investment SEO Basics | User Experience (UX) | Mobile SEO If your brand hasn't adopted a mobile-friendly mindset, it's likely you're falling behind the competition. Read this post By: Stuart Hall July 5, 2016 6 Tips for Positioning Your App to Attain Millions of Downloads Mobile SEO | SEO Tools Back in 2013, I was co-founder of a music discovery mobile app that we managed to grow to over 4 million downloads. Many of the things we tried to grow the app were successful, but many were a complete disaster. I wanted to see if I could repeat the success. Could I build a simple app and grow into a successful app? Would the techniques I learned still apply? First, I needed an idea.... Read this post By: Bridget Randolph May 24, 2016 The Landscape of Mobile Search is Changing – How Will You Adapt? Search Engines | Mobile SEO Should you have an app, or not? Would AMPs work for you? Are you prepared for the intelligent personal assistant takeover? Consider how you'll adapt to the world of mobile search as it changes beneath your feet in this post examining current and future trends. Read this post By: Tom Anthony May 20, 2016 All About App Search: Indexing, Ranking Factors, Universal Links, and More Mobile SEO | Whiteboard Friday App search is growing and changing, and there's more opportunity than ever to both draw customers in at the top of the funnel and retain them at the bottom. In today's special British Whiteboard Friday, Tom Anthony and Will Critchlow of Distilled dig into everything app search and highlight a future where Google may have some competition as the search engine giant. Read this post By: Eric Enge April 20, 2016 Battleground Mobile: Why (& How) to Prepare for the Future Mobile SEO Believe it or not, the mobile takeover is still only just beginning. It's more important than ever to plan ahead. In this post, Eric Enge itemizes the tactical opportunities you have to create a mobile-first mindset from the get-go. Read this post By: Chapman Lever March 17, 2016 How Google's AMP Will Influence Your Online Marketing Search Engines | Mobile SEO Accelerated Mobile Pages are a big new change in mobile search. Get the low-down on just how they may positively and negatively affect your online marketing practices. Read this post By: Ashley Sefferman March 15, 2016 The App Store Optimization Checklist: Top 10 Tips On-page SEO | SEO Basics | Mobile SEO The world is going mobile, and those apps ahead of the curve in ASO and app indexing trends will be those that nab market share from traditionally web-dominated search results. Ashley Sefferman will help you get ahead of the pack with these 10 awesome tips to check off your app optimization list. Read this post By: Rebecca Maynes March 3, 2016 Eye Tracking in 2016: How Searchers Interact with Mobile SERPs vs. Desktop Search Engines | Mobile SEO The mobile searcher sees the world pretty differently from the desktop searcher. New for 2016, Mediative offers insights from their eye-tracking study on mobile SERPs. Learn what you can do to boost your mobile visibility in those all-important top organic listings! Read this post By: Cindy Krum February 16, 2016 Beyond App Streaming & AMP: Connection Speed's Impact on Mobile Search Mobile SEO SEOs have a new upcoming hurdle to leap in the race for rankings: searcher connection speed. Cindy Krum explains how and why Google is testing connection speed as a ranking factor, and what you should be thinking about for the future. Read this post By: Bailey Mezan February 4, 2016 Here’s How App Store Optimization Can Work for Your Brand Search Engines | SEO Tools | Mobile SEO The abundance of apps within the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store makes them both great and scary places to run a business. Despite the plethora of choices, however, a brand can find a home and thrive in the app store. However, it is the job of the app publishers and marketers to make that mission a reality through (a) higher engagements and conversions amongst app store visitor... Read this post
